forecast.day_comments: Snow. The snow could be heavy at times.  High near 27. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 7 to 11 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow before midnight.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. Northwest wind around 6 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
